channel.title: is there a clock in bvs?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "is there a clock in bvs?"

item.title: Re: is there a clock in bvs?
item.content:encoded: They added it accouple days ago but I'm sure you all noticed it

item.title: Re: is there a clock in bvs?
item.content:encoded:
if you want one on your PC, so you can always see waht time it is in the US: you could just change your computer clock. just double click it, plug in your time in your country and then choose another timezone(wichever one it is you desire it to show).
there was a way to have windows show you 2 clocks at a time but i forgot how to do it ;) (maybe it was a programm i don't remember. i just know i once had it like that)

item.title: Re: is there a clock in bvs?
item.content:encoded: Just post a message on the village board. The time of posting is displayed right there.

item.title: Re: is there a clock in bvs?
item.content:encoded:
You mean a clock in the Game?
I never found one.

Well, you're in Israel (GMT +3:00) and they at West of US (GMT -8:00), 11 hours of difference.
Midnight to you is 13:00 in the game.

item.title: Re: is there a clock in bvs?
item.content:encoded:
israel…
do you know where could i find a clock for thats area?

item.title: Re: is there a clock in bvs?
item.content:encoded:
I guess they use the (GMT -8:00) Pacific Time (US & Canada)
I'm in a different country too, from Brazil, where are you from?

item.title: is there a clock in bvs?
item.content:encoded: i need a clock for knowing what is the server time…im in a diffrent cuntry and i dont know the time…
